name: sprout (itch) (diddykong13)
description:
NOTE: This game requests location - this is purely to get the sunrise and sunset times via this API: https://sunrise-sunset.org/api. If you choose not to allow location, some default sunrise and sunset times will be used instead.

Grow by day only.

In this game you play a simple plant sprout, attempting to grow as big and strong as it can. Avoid the rocky cliffs and make your way up. But ony during the day because come sunset there will not be enough light to grow!

Missing features (that I didn't have time for!):

  • Leaves on the sprout
  • Bud on the sprout
  • Improved background colours/rendering
  • AUDIO!! Music and SFX.
